name: LIFE SERVICE SYSTEMS, Appellant, v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW
name_abbreviation: Life Service Systems v. Unemployment Compensation Board of Review

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: LIFE SERVICE SYSTEMS, Appellant, v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James R. Antoniono, DeBernardo, Antoniono, McCabe & Davis, P.C., Greensburg, for appellant.
James K. Bradley and Judith M. Gilroy, Unemployment Compensation Bd. of Review, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
639 A.2d 1172
LIFE SERVICE SYSTEMS, Appellant, v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 9, 1994.
Decided March 30, 1994.
James R. Antoniono, DeBernardo, Antoniono, McCabe & Davis, P.C., Greensburg, for appellant.
James K. Bradley and Judith M. Gilroy, Unemployment Compensation Bd. of Review, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
